wani chithrapata adhyakshanaya kala sen lowa nan desin sammana gananawak dinu daksha adhyakshakawarayeki. 10.matti kasila upatha - 1924 janawari 12 finlantha jathika adhyakshakawarayeku wana kasila 1950 saha 1960 kalaye kriyakariwa katayuthu kala wishishta sinamakaruweku lesin lo pura kirthiyata path wi atha.
